examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
    "error": false,
    "message": "All Products Details Found",
    "status": 200,
    "data": [
                {
                   productId:"string",
                   name: "string",
                   description: "string"
                   price: number,
                   category:"string",
                   freeDelivery:"boolean",
                   imageLink:"string",
                   views: "number",
                   availableSizes: object(type = array),
                   tags: object(type = array),
                   inStock: "boolean",
                   productAdded: today,
                   lastModified: today
                }
            ]
      }
  }
}
